title: Bruder 03760 Man TGS Garbage Truck (Orange) 28.12.10
description:
The Man TGS is the perfect all-rounder for construction sites, long-distance haulage, and local distribution. Robustly built, equipped with powerful engines, and boasting an above-average payload, this truck is the prototype of the much-described "all-rounder" with a host of innovations on board. As the wheel rotates, the garbage is then drawn into the functional compactor, compacted, and finally transported to the garbage bunker. This process is vividly demonstrated through a viewing window. The handle on top of the garbage bunker is used to tip the waste. By turning this handle, the garbage is transported to the rear via the discharge carriage, past the raised loading and unloading unit, and out to the outside. Two small garbage cans and treaded tires are included. To complement the play, the Man TGS garbage truck can be equipped with the garbage can set (3 small, 1 large) (item no. 02607).
